entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:04 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:04 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 13.
